name.description: Name of the node to get logs from

query.description: query specifies services(s) or files from which to return logs (required). Example: "kubelet" to fetch kubelet logs, "/<log-file-name>" to fetch a specific log file from the node (e.g., "/var/log/kubelet.log" or "/var/log/kube-proxy.log")

tailLines.description: Number of lines to retrieve from the end of the logs (Optional, 0 means all logs)
